r.s: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making image source code independent on the library used.
r.d: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making image source code independent on the library used.
r.n: * Added Request #4997 "HTML attributes and JS actions in imagemaps" - using 'htmltags' entry * Fixed bug with fonts, now it's not required for the font to have a name * Changed examples to use require_once instead of include/require
